ConfigurationTable.description: Configurable options to tune Data Table performance
ConfigurationTable.name: PersistenceProviderCustomSettings

ServiceDefinition.description: For the first adding of BuildingParts into the database
ServiceDefinition.name: AddEntry

ServiceDefinition.description: Adds a Listener/Participant in collaborative session. The result returns if there already is an ARClient online or if the username is already taken
ServiceDefinition.name: AddListener

ResultType.description: result = 0: Second AR Client tries to connect - shouldnt; result = 1: Chosen user name is already taken; 2 = everything worked
ResultType.name: result

ServiceDefinition.description: Empties all changes while not purging the entire datatable. Parts (keys) stay in the table. To reset marks, not to change assembly!
ServiceDefinition.name: EmptyDataTable

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns all the Rows that have Values filled in any of the non-keys
ServiceDefinition.name: GetAllChangedRows

ServiceDefinition.description: Overwrites existing Entry with new Values
ServiceDefinition.name: OverwriteRow

ServiceDefinition.description: Removes a client from the property listenerTable
ServiceDefinition.name: RemoveListener

ServiceDefinition.description: Returns an Infotable with all the data from a specific building part
ServiceDefinition.name: RetrieveSensorData

ResultType.description: Revtrieves the sensor value for a given Part Number
ResultType.name: result
